CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. A32 reads: "Rehearsal Time - Under the baton of Karl Kritz, associate conductor of the Pittsburgh Symphony, high school musicians rehearse in Taylor Allderdice High School Auditorium in preparation for the fourth annual joint concert by the Pittsburgh Symphony Junior and the Senior Symphony. Front: Patricia Prattis of Westinghouse High School, guest piano soloist for the concert.  Back row, left to right: Judy Singer, of Mount Lebanon High School, concertmistress; Mr. Kritz, and Anne Forrester, also of Mount Lebanon, French horn player. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Karl Kritz, associate conductor of the Pittsburgh Symphony, standing behind Judy Singer holding violin, Patricia Prattis, seated at piano, and Anne Forrester, holding french horn, in Taylor Allderdice High School Auditorium
